archival_memory.daycare_extra_clothes: Bring extra set of clothes—last set got muddy.
archival_memory.doctor_schedule_visit: Schedule pediatrician visit for kid's cold.
archival_memory.doctor_vaccine_schedule: Check vaccine schedule—next shots due in two months.
archival_memory.doctor_food_allergies_monitor: Monitor food allergies—keep a log if symptoms flare up.
archival_memory.family_time_park_visit: Take kid to park this weekend.
archival_memory.family_time_bedtime_story_book: Pick out a new bedtime story book.
archival_memory.family_time_counting_practice: Help with counting practice—focus on numbers 1-20.
archival_memory.shopping_school_supplies: Get school supplies—crayons, notebooks, glue sticks.
archival_memory.shopping_extra_snacks: Pack extra snacks in daycare bag.
